scenes.description: 'So, what's our next step to implement this structured approach?'

options.text: We could start by creating a detailed plan with specific roles and timelines.
options.analysis: You proposed a concrete plan, showing good perception and social skills, though your empathy and motivation were moderate.

options.text: I think we should have a brainstorming session to gather everyone's input first.
options.analysis: You suggested involving the team, showing strong self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation.

options.text: Honestly, we might be overcomplicating things. Maybe just a simple checklist would do.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat dismissive, indicating lower empathy and self-regulation, which might not fully address the complexity of the issue.
